shield.name: Shield
shield.description:
Allow the ball to bounce
from the bottom for 10 s

overload.name: Overload
overload.description:
Increase the strength of all bumpers
x2 for 10 s

bonus.name: Bonus
bonus.description:
Increase points scored
x5 for 5 s

collector.name: Collector
collector.description:
Increase points scored x4
if all your balls are different

bonusball.name: Bonus Ball
bonusball.description:
Get an additional ball
while this card is in your inventory

Caution: selling this card removes
last ball added

cardholder.name: Cardholder
cardholder.description:
Get extra inventory slot
while this card is in your inventory
This card does not take space

wrench.name: Wrench
wrench.description:
Destroy an object
in field modification mode

special.name: Special Edition
special.description:
All common cards
are 2x less common

multiball.name: Multiball
multiball.description:
Split the currently launched
ball into 2 balls

sellball.name: Sell ball
sellball.description:
Sell your current ball
for $250. Be careful, do not
sell your last ball!

giveaway.name: Giveaway
giveaway.description:
One card or buildable in the shop
is free (before reroll)

quintupler.name: Quintupler
quintupler.description:
Earn 5x score until
the end of a round

bank_dep.name: Bank deposit
bank_dep.description:
Increase maximum interest on
your money by additional $50

ball_loan.name: Ball investment
ball_loan.description:
Earn extra $100
per ball left on round win

platinum.name: Platinum card
platinum.description:
Earn additional 10%
interest on your money

rewind.name: Rewind
rewind.description:
Chance 20% for each ball
to return if it is lost

dupe.name: Dupe glitch
dupe.description:
Activate copy of your topmost usable
card when the ball is lost

no_score.name: Broken scoring chip
no_score.description:
You earn no score while
this card is in your inventory

Does not take space
in your inventory

debt.name: Debt
debt.description:
All your current items
become worthless

Does not take space
in your inventory

brittle.name: Brittle field
brittle.description:
Cooldowned objects break
instead of going on cooldown
To sell, you need to break at least
one object by this card

Does not take space
in your inventory

pro_mode.name: Pro mode
pro_mode.description:
Score requirement is doubled for each round
To sell, you need to score 2x current score requirement

Does not take space in your inventory

launcher.name: Launcher
launcher.description:
Upgrade your launch ramp
with a charge bonus

Charge bonus will give you $2
for each indicator triggered but only
if the ball launches through the lower exit

reroll_mode.name: Reroll stock market
reroll_mode.description:
Shop reroll's cost is growing linearly
instead of exponentially

extra_shelf.name: Extra shelf
extra_shelf.description:
Adds 1 more buildable
object to the shop

extra_showcase.name: Extra showcase
extra_showcase.description:
Adds 1 more card
to the shop

extra_pack.name: Trading card collector
extra_pack.description:
Adds 1 more pack
to the shop

agile.name: Agile
agile.description: Agile ball is smaller and faster

bumperball.name: Bumperball
bumperball.description:
Bumper ball is a bumper by itself!
(just a very bouncy ball)

gold.name: Golden ball
gold.description: Golden ball earns $5 for each hit!

lucky.name: Lucky Ball
lucky.description:
Lucky ball has a 30% chance
to return if it is lost

1up.name: 1-UP
1up.description:
1-UP ball adds 1 to each bumper's
points on each hit

8ball.name: 8 ball
8ball.description:
8 ball has a 1/8 chance to score 800 points
on each hit, but it sets your score and money to 0
if it is lost before 8 hits

coin.name: Bouncy Coin
coin.description:
Bumper that gives $10
for each hit

longboi.name: Long boi
longboi.description:
Long easier flipper, but each hit
will cost you $10

pro_flipper.name: Pro flipper
pro_flipper.description:
Flipper for professionals
Earn $10 per hit

pinpoint.name: Pinpoint
pinpoint.description:
Activated pin.
If all pins of this type on the field
are activated, you score 100 for each pin
(A single pin scores 10)

epic.name: Epic Pack
epic.description:
Get a guaranteed epic card
but together with a negative card

text.sell_zone:
Drop item here
to sell it
text.sell-:
Drop to pay ${}
to get rid of it

message.return_lose: Press ENTER or click to return to main menu
message.go_next: Press ENTER or click to continue
message.field_description:
Configure the playing field
with buildables and object removing cards
message.finish_description:
Finish round early to get
bonus $ for balls remaining
